name: RGBot
description:
UPDATE: Development is continuing!

Like and follow my Facebook page for more development updates! https://www.facebook.com/Jared-York-Games-232567477457451/

RGBot

RGBot is a platformer all about toggling colored switches. Your goal is to make your way out of a rapidly degrading hard drive without running out of space. Within the hard drive, data corruption has been moving in on your robot. Can you make it out alive?

The Team:

  • Jared York - Lead Developer, designer
  • Ben Lirio - Developer, designer
Controls

W - Jump
A - Move left
D - Move right
